text: Are you troubled by ______ in the middle of the night? Do you experience ______ in your basement or attic? Have you or any member of your family ever seen ______?
As a duly designated representative of the city, county, and state of New York, I order you to cease ______.
At first, the baby was fussy, but then we gave him ______ and he went right to sleep.
Being ______ and treating other people like ______ is every New Yorker's God-given right.
Find me ______, that I might live again!
I'm studying the effects of ______ on psychic ability.
If there's a steady paycheck in it, I'll believe ______.
It's the Scoleri Brothers! I tried them for ______, gave them ______!
Okay, who brought the ______?
On a mountain of ______, in a castle of ______, I sat upon a throne of ______.
That's the bedroom, but ______ happened in there.
There is no ______, only Zuul.
There seem to be six million completely miserable assholes ______ in the tri-state area.
This is Prince Vigo, ruler of ______.
We're exterminators. Somebody saw ______ up on twelve.
Well, there are already so many holes in 1st Avenue, we didn't think anyone would notice ______.
What horrifying thing was lurking in the refrigerator?
When someone asks you if you're ______, you say YES!
When you started introducing me as ______. That's when I left.
Who you gonna call?
Yes, it's true. This man has no ______.
______, and you want to keep it?
